column5: Hi, anyone have any info about the ice on Lake Nipissing? Going to North Bay this weekend (Dec, 7) and would be great to try the first ice fishing of the season. Thanks!!!
Not any good ice yet. Walleye doesn't open until Jan 1st.
Lake Nipissing is closed to all species from Decenber 1 to Jan 1.  You could look into panfish or trout in zone 11 on another waterbody, but Nipissing is off limits for now.
Thanks for replying and you guys are right , I forgot to check the exceptions for Nipissing
Plenty of people are fishing around NB on smaller lakes.  Walleye is open, just not on Nipissing.
